clues.text: Wooden stave churches of Norway were built by these seafarers using shipbuilding techniques

Term for the isolation of a jury from the public; it lasted 9 months in the O.J. Simpson criminal case

rounds.comments: (Alex: Everything you've ever wanted to know about tea is in this category!)

rounds.comments: (Alex: In this category, each correct response will be a letter and number combined.)

clues.response: the pursuit of happiness is a warm gun

clues.text: 1964 No. 2 hit that says, "Do you promise not to tell" that I'm a spy

clues.text: Take this sad song, a 1968 No. 1, & Thomas Hardy's last novel & make it better

rounds.text: Like the name of a minor Roman god, this word for a caretaker comes from the Latin for "door"
